_header: To dwell in court my friend give that thou list
Note: Cf. Maitland’s ‘Counsell to his son beand in the court’.
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Rewl of anis self’ — six 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain

Banna.First Lines:
To dwell in court my freind gife þat thow listfor gift of
                    fortoun Invy thow no degre…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Quho so dois this Sicker I ȝow asseurehe rewlis weill
                    That sa weill him can gyd
